title: Crumar Stratus Synth
description:
Introduced in 1982 as a slimmed down version of the Crumar Trilogy
2 Synth Engines in one: Synth & Organ Synth
Independent Volumes for Each Synth
4 Octave Volume Faders for the Organ Synth
6 Note Polyphonic
CEM Chip Set
2 Oscillators offer Saw & Square Waves, can be tuned separately and synced
49 Keys (some damaged, priced to reflect)
Joystick Controller for pitch bend & modulation
